snippet.title: ALONE? - VR Trailer #1
snippet.description:
Immerse yourself in a true virtual reality horror experience with the release of “Alone VR” for HTC Vive.

Explore and experience a fully immersive world as you embark on an adventure like nothing you have played before. Come face-to-face with terror itself as you navigate around a haunted house, underground caverns, gloomy caves, and an old decrepit morgue. But beware: some mysteries are better left alone.  

Your sister Michelle, is missing. All you have to go by is a letter that was left in your post. Reading it, you find that the letter is from your sister, and is a plea for help; it begs for you to return to your childhood home, and to help with the strange occurrences that have been plaguing her (and your childhood home) over the past few months.

Can you track down your missing sister? And discover the strange happenings at the home where he grew up in? All awhile, finding hunting the sinister activities that are occurring in his childhood home. But beware, nothing is as it seems.
